%toc
%title vim mapping

= The kinds of vim mapping =
| *nested/recursive*   | *NOT* nested/recursive | *Remove* mapping | *Remove All* mapping | *List All* mapping | *List key* mapping |
|----------------------+------------------------+------------------+----------------------+--------------------+--------------------|
| map {lhs} {rhs}      | noremap {lhs} {rhs}    | unmap {lhs}      | mapclear             | map                | map {lhs}          |
|----------------------+------------------------+------------------+----------------------+--------------------+--------------------|
| nmap {lhs} {rhs}     | nnoremap {lhs} {rhs}   | nunmap {lhs}     | nmapclear            | nmap               | nmap {lhs}         |
|----------------------+------------------------+------------------+----------------------+--------------------+--------------------|
| vmap {lhs} {rhs}     | vnoremap {lhs} {rhs}   | vunmap {lhs}     | vmapclear            | vmap               | vmap {lhs}         |
|----------------------+------------------------+------------------+----------------------+--------------------+--------------------|
| xmap {lhs} {rhs}     | xnoremap {lhs} {rhs}   | xunmap {lhs}     | xmapclear            | xmap               | xmap {lhs}         |
|----------------------+------------------------+------------------+----------------------+--------------------+--------------------|
| smap {lhs} {rhs}     | snoremap {lhs} {rhs}   | sunmap {lhs}     | smapclear            | smap               | smap {lhs}         |
|----------------------+------------------------+------------------+----------------------+--------------------+--------------------|
| omap {lhs} {rhs}     | onoremap {lhs} {rhs}   | ounmap {lhs}     | omapclear            | omap               | omap {lhs}         |
|----------------------+------------------------+------------------+----------------------+--------------------+--------------------|
| map! {lhs} {rhs}     | noremap! {lhs} {rhs}   | unmap! {lhs}     | mapclear!            | map!               | map! {lhs}         |
|----------------------+------------------------+------------------+----------------------+--------------------+--------------------|
| imap {lhs} {rhs}     | inoremap {lhs} {rhs}   | iunmap {lhs}     | imapclear            | imap               | imap {lhs}         |
|----------------------+------------------------+------------------+----------------------+--------------------+--------------------|
| lmap {lhs} {rhs}     | lnoremap {lhs} {rhs}   | lunmap {lhs}     | lmapclear            | lmap               | lmap {lhs}         |
|----------------------+------------------------+------------------+----------------------+--------------------+--------------------|
| cmap {lhs} {rhs}     | cnoremap {lhs} {rhs}   | cunmap {lhs}     | cmapclear            | cmap               | cmap {lhs}         |
|----------------------+------------------------+------------------+----------------------+--------------------+--------------------|
| _normal {lhs} {rhs}_ | _+nore {lhs} {rhs}_    | _+un {lhs}_      | _+clear_             | _normal_           | _normal {lhs}_     |
|----------------------+------------------------+------------------+----------------------+--------------------+--------------------|

| Mapping Type | Normal | Visual | Select | Insert | Command-line | Lang-Arg | Operator-pending |
|--------------+--------+--------+--------+--------+--------------+----------+------------------|
| map          | Y      | Y      | Y      |        |              |          | Y                |
|--------------+--------+--------+--------+--------+--------------+----------+------------------|
| n-map        | Y      |        |        |        |              |          |                  |
|--------------+--------+--------+--------+--------+--------------+----------+------------------|
| v-map        |        | Y      | Y      |        |              |          |                  |
|--------------+--------+--------+--------+--------+--------------+----------+------------------|
| o-map        |        |        |        |        |              |          | Y                |
|--------------+--------+--------+--------+--------+--------------+----------+------------------|
| x-map        |        | Y      |        |        |              |          |                  |
|--------------+--------+--------+--------+--------+--------------+----------+------------------|
| s-map        |        |        | Y      |        |              |          |                  |
|--------------+--------+--------+--------+--------+--------------+----------+------------------|
| !-map        |        |        |        | Y      | Y            |          |                  |
|--------------+--------+--------+--------+--------+--------------+----------+------------------|
| i-map        |        |        |        | Y      |              |          |                  |
|--------------+--------+--------+--------+--------+--------------+----------+------------------|
| c-map        |        |        |        |        | Y            |          |                  |
|--------------+--------+--------+--------+--------+--------------+----------+------------------|
| l-map        |        |        |        | Y*     | Y*           | Y*       |                  |
|--------------+--------+--------+--------+--------+--------------+----------+------------------|
